sentences.en: APEC has made a very commendable attempt in this respect.
sentences.cn: apec在这方面已经作出了非常有益的尝试.
鲍德温的回答诚实可嘉。

sentences.en: But his attitude toward the Templeton Prize is nothing but commendable.
sentences.cn: 但是他对于坦普顿奖的态度,却是值得钦佩的.

sentences.en: But it is still commendable for its determination and tenacity.
sentences.cn: 不过它有这样的决心和毅力,却是难能可贵的.

sentences.en: Considering the restrictions under which she filmed, I think she did a commendable job.
sentences.cn: 考虑到她拍摄时所受的各种限制，我觉得她交出的答卷值得嘉许。

sentences.en: Here a commendable service, a very thoughtful and careful.
sentences.cn: 值得称道的是这里的服务, 非常细致周到.

sentences.en: His spirit of being ready to take up the cudgels for a just cause is commendable.
sentences.cn: 他那种见义勇为的精神是难能可贵的.

sentences.en: I granted her that this was a very commendable.
sentences.cn: 我承认这办法倒是值得赞美的.

sentences.en: Miss Ophelia , after this , did labor , with a commendable degree of real and energy.
sentences.cn: 从此以后, 奥菲丽亚小姐果然以令人钦佩的热情和精力着手工作.

sentences.en: Mr Sparrow has acted with commendable speed.
sentences.cn: 斯帕罗先生行动之快值得赞扬。

sentences.en: Singapore's model of race relations is commendable are allowed to be themselves.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的种族关系模式是值得称道的.
这样吹毛求疵真不大好.
这种积极性是很可贵的.

sentences.en: That's really commendable Can I treat you to a morning coffee?
sentences.cn: 这可是应该表扬的事.我请你喝咖啡好 吗 ?
你的热情非常值得嘉许。

sentences.en: Your ideas are on the mark and your work commendable.
sentences.cn: 你的想法是对的,你的工作是值得表扬的.

sentences.en: Your ideas are right on the mark and your work commendable.
sentences.cn: 你的想法很中肯并且工作值得表扬.

trans.tran_cn: 值得表扬的，值得称赞的，很好的，可推荐的
